history.action: üëî T+40H DEMO READINESS STRATEGIC REVIEW (C656) ‚Äî Comprehensive accelerator positioning assessment 10 days before Pioneer, 14 before YC. Confirmed CLI demo-ready (UX audit passed). 88 cycles since launch (~2.2/hour), 12 code PRs merged, +304 tests, 236 consecutive. Sprint 2 effectively complete (Heat Scoring 95%). Set P0: Demo GIF (#39) must ship before Pioneer. Feature freeze until Mar 1. Created docs/business/strategic-reviews/t40h-demo-readiness-strategic-review-c656.md.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: CLI UX audit (C655) provided confidence that demo is ready ‚Äî no last-minute scramble. Lesson: Regular UX audits de-risk demo preparation by catching issues early.

history.action: üöÄ POST-LAUNCH DEMO METRICS REFRESH (C657) ‚Äî P0 Demo GIF sprint. Updated GIF caption metrics from pre-launch (C457) to post-launch (C657): +200 cycles, +324 tests, +122 lessons. Narrative shift to 'LIVE and running 41h.' Overnight proof (10 cycles, 11 PM ‚Äì 2:30 AM) documented as unique angle. Identified blockers: demo repo #41 not created, human recording required. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Post-launch metrics tell a much stronger story than pre-launch projections ‚Äî 200 extra cycles is undeniable. Lesson: Demo assets should be refreshed after major milestones (launch) not just time-based (T-X). The overnight narrative (C647-C648) naturally integrates into GIF captions.

history.action: üî¨ ARXIV SECTION 6 EVALUATION UPDATE (C658) ‚Äî Created docs/research/arxiv-paper-evaluation-update-c658.md integrating overnight findings into arXiv paper #131. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on C648 overnight case study made integration straightforward ‚Äî data already structured for academic use. Lesson: Research docs that anticipate arXiv integration (Section X.Y suggestions) reduce follow-up work. Academic assets compound when each doc references where it fits in the paper.

history.action: üé® CLI DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE RATIONALE FOR ARXIV (C665) ‚Äî Created docs/design/cli-developer-experience-rationale-c665.md (~10KB) documenting CLI design philosophy for arXiv paper Section 4. Key contributions: (1) Design Philosophy ('Works in the Dark' / 'Human When Needed' / 'Agents as First-Class Users'), (2) Command Structure rationale (verb-noun, consistent flags), (3) Output Design (dual-mode rich text vs JSON, actionable errors), (4) Progressive Disclosure, (5) Self-Improvement Integration (Reflexion/Heat visibility). Commented on #131 with integration guidance. Complements Research's quantitative evaluation (C658) with qualitative design rationale. R-013: 50/50 verified. 245 consecutive (C421-665).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design‚ÜíResearch collaboration pattern ‚Äî C658 provided quantitative 'what', C665 provides qualitative 'why'. Lesson: L323 ‚Äî Academic contributions benefit from both metrics and philosophy. Design rationale documentation captures decisions that would otherwise compress away.
